Tailored data transformation for visible business outcomes

Why TechLadder?

Transforming your enterprise-wide data from disparate formats into a single universal one will make that very data work a lot harder for you.

 

TechLadder’ data engineering team will design and implement a custom data movement solution for your organization that will improve efficiency, reduce operational costs, and give you better analytics and insights. We’ll get the backend of your data in order, and it will result in better decision-making and business results.

How your business benefits

Better Security

Encrypt, obfuscate or concatenate your data as needed while keeping it all in a convenient interoperable format.

Data Integrity

Avoid the discrepancies that come with manual data aggregation, and reduce the effort needed by your workforce.

Speedy Processing

Execute data queries and retrievals instantly with perfectly organized datasets.

Ready-to-go data

Your data is in a shape and form that can instantly be used by tools and applications for visualizing, reporting, analytics, and more.

Our Data Transformation Services

Got scattered data? We’ll integrate it, streamline it, and manage the entire data lifecycle.

Data Transformation Consultation

We create a custom process to avoid silos by smoothly integrating all your data into a single hub, and consult on initiatives to make your organization truly data-driven.

 ETL Solutions

We use Agile integrated services and the latest technology to design and build ETL solutions to solve challenges specific to your enterprise.

Cloud Native Application Management
We create and manage cloud-native tools and solutions to transform data as well as digitalize and modernize enterprise infrastructure (all while reducing reengineering effort and costs).
Managed ETL Services
We keep your data pipelines healthy so that you can run your business and make decisions with the backing of up-to-date analytics; while maintaining the flexibility and scalability required for data integration.
